title: Found ID on larger font. Still need ID on small font of logo. They look almost like pen strokes.
content:
Font: 

 Vivaldi

author: Pudgekip

comments.content: Font is Vivaldi (both capital and rest of letters). You can see it here [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/vivaldi/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018130419/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/vivaldi/)

Wow, thank you so much!

Might you know by chance what the other fotn is? The one used in the word "addiction"?

Thank you so much again.
